name: We are the Artist
description:
「We are the Artist」 is art games.

Acrylic painting, molding pots, decorating plates , paint games..., many art orders are lining up for you.
Follow your customer requirements about colors, textures, shapes..., and try to do it right.
There will be similar color shades on the palette, so make sure you can pick the right color.
The more accurate your artwork is the more acclaim and cash you will get from your customers.
You can use the cash to level up and get new orders. Each time the level goes up, the interior space will also be upgraded with new decorations.

Have fun and show your creativity!
